name: epicurus
text: This is exactly what I was thinking. Eating eggs through which a vagina wig from a diseased prostitute from the past is not on my top ten culinary experiences.

name: lolcatdeluxe
text: It is an old technique for skimming out shell fragments. Unlike our disposable society today ancient people had MANY uses for merkins. Example, in a pinch they can be used as a pirate's eyepatch. Henry Morgan used an early Jamaican thatched merkin at the battle of Vilahermosa when his own was eaten by a dying parrot.

name: soticoto
text:
It probably has a load of old eggs (of a different kind) buried in it anyway.
Prossies had to flush. Couldn't be getting buns up the oven.

name: featurelessvoid
text: Okay, so Teodor didn't know what it was. That's not the disturbing part. The disturbing part is that he found a mysterious hairy thing and decided that the sensible course of action would be to dip it in his eggs .

I assume Teodor was just messing around with it, and then when Ray yelled at him pretended he was about to dip it in the eggs just to mess with him.
God, I hope that's what he was doing.
